StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATECAMPUS
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATECAMPUS(pID IN NUMBER, pName IN VARCHAR2, pLocation IN VARCHAR2, pAddress IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pPhone IN NUMBER, pFax IN NUMBER, pHead IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN&lt;br/&gt; UPDATE Campus_table campus&lt;br/&gt; SET campus.nameCampus = pName,&lt;br/&gt; campus.locationCampus = pLocation,&lt;br/&gt; campus.address = pAddress,&lt;br/&gt; campus.phone = pPhone,&lt;br/&gt; campus.fax = pFax,&lt;br/&gt; campus.head = pHead&lt;br/&gt; WHERE campus.idCampus = pID;&lt;br/&gt;END updateCampus;
